sentences.en: " I congratulate you, my brother, " were his words as he turned round.
sentences.cn: “ 祝贺你, 弟弟, ” 他转过身子说出的竟是这样的话.

sentences.en: Allow me to heartily congratulate you.
He never even stopped to congratulate me.
sentences.cn: 他甚至没有过来向我祝贺。

sentences.en: He was generous enough to congratulate his successor on his decision.
sentences.cn: 他十分大度地祝贺他的继任者做出了决定。

sentences.en: I congratulate myself upon my narrow escape.
I congratulate President Carter on his victory here.
sentences.cn: 我在此祝贺卡特总统的胜利.

sentences.en: I congratulate you with all my heart.
I should congratulate you that you resisted the temptation.
sentences.cn: 我应向你祝贺,你抗住了这种引诱.

sentences.en: Let's congratulate ourselves that this transaction has been made.
sentences.cn: 让我们祝贺这次交易圆满成功.

sentences.en: Listeners wrote in to congratulate the radio actor on his performance.
sentences.cn: 听众写信祝贺那位广播员的演技.

sentences.en: People slapped me on the back after the fight, ie to congratulate me.
sentences.cn: 拳击比赛后大家拍拍我的背(以示祝贺).

sentences.en: She could not but congratulate him.
Waterstone has every reason to congratulate himself.
sentences.cn: 沃特斯通完全有理由为自己感到高兴。

sentences.en: We congratulate you beforehand on your success.
We specifically wanted to congratulate certain players.
sentences.cn: 我们特别想表扬几名选手。

sentences.en: We were the first to congratulate the bride and groom.
sentences.cn: 我们是最先向新娘、新郎祝贺的.

trans.tran_cn: 祝贺，称赞，为（自己）感到高兴
trans.tran_en: to tell someone that you are happy because they have achieved something or because something nice has happened to them
to tell someone that you are happy because they have achieved something or because something nice has happened to them
